body.p: If you click your user name in the top-right corner of the interface, a drop-down menu will appear. From this menu, select Profile to access the profile settings page. It displays information about your name, email, avatar, and allows you to delete your account or specify which types of notifications will be sent to you via email.

dlentry.dd: This section displays information about your Name and Email.
Use this option to specify the UI language.

dlentry.dt: User Role (only available in evaluation versions)
dlentry.dd: Use this option to specify your user's role. This is set by an administrator in Enterprise versions.

These options specify which types of notifications will be sent to you via email:
New messages are added on review tasks assigned to me
New messages are added on review tasks owned by me
Review tasks owned by me are finalized by a reviewer
New reviewers are assigned to public tasks owned by me
A file is modified by a collaborator on a review task owned by me or assigned to me - When this option is selected, the system waits for 20 minutes after the first edit before sending the notification. If a reviewer makes changes within that 20-minute interval, only one email notification is sent.

Enable tree editing in the Publications side-view - When selected (default), the publications tree can be edited in a specialized DITA map tree editor. When not selected, the publication tree is displayed as read only.
Permanently deletes your account. A confirmation dialog box is displayed to ensure deletions do not happen by mistake.

section.title: Other Email Notifications
section.p:
You will also receive automatic email notifications in other situations, including:
When you are invited to collaborate on a task.
When the due date for a task is updated.
When the due date for a task is within 3 days, 1 day, and 12 hours of its expiration. In this situation, the email notification is sent to any reviewers who have not finalized the task.
